attributes.action: Stop any Prison from being built in the Dagenham and Rainham area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jon Cruddas MP and local Councillors have launched a campaign against proposals for a new 1,500 place prison being built in Dagenham, on the former Fords site.

 

London already has six prisons, we don’t need a seventh being built in the east of London. Jon Cruddas MP knows there is need for extra prisons in the UK as he does not want to see people who have been sentenced being released early due to over crowding. However not in Dagenham or Rainham area.
